Freya: These warm spring sunrays feel strange to me undoubtedly because I'm used to the frozen eternal winter of the Ice Palace. I fear they may be causing some equally strange thoughts, as I'm feeling rather generous right now. Give me one Adena and I shall bestow a gift upon you for visiting me. However, if you don't intend to bother me, leave me alone a while, say... 20 hours, so that I might enjoy this change of weather. Oh and also, should you find any heart-warming items during your adventures, bring them back to me and I might feel even more generous...

[scripts_events.FreyaEvent.FreyaEvent:receiveGift|Give one Adena to Freya.]
